entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
